title: Hello, I'm Sabourifar!
subtitle: Web & Python Developer | Graphic Designer | Crypto Lover

items.content: I'm a highly motivated and results-oriented individual with a passion for web development. I'm excited to embark on my journey as a web developer and bring my enthusiasm for creating user-friendly and visually appealing websites to life, I'm confident that my dedication, eagerness to learn, and strong work ethic will make me a valuable asset to any team. I'm excited to contribute to the creation of innovative and user-centric web experiences.

I'm a passionate web developer specializing in React and front-end technologies, with a strong background in Python programming. I thrive on building dynamic and responsive web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
React: Proficient in building robust and scalable user interfaces using React, Redux, and related libraries. Experienced in creating reusable components, managing state, and optimizing performance.

JavaScript: Solid understanding of modern JavaScript syntax, including arrow functions, destructuring, and module systems. Comfortable working with asynchronous programming using Promises and Async/Await.
HTML & CSS: Adept at crafting pixel-perfect layouts and styling using HTML5, CSS3, and preprocessors like Sass/SCSS.
Python: Skilled in Python programming with a focus on back-end development, data manipulation, and scripting. Familiar with popular Python frameworks like Django and Flask.
